Adriene, I have been severely disabled for more than seven years, to the point where I could not exercise at all. In the last several months, when I began to recover my health and look around for movement to strengthen my body, I found your channel and started trying shorter practices. My fiancée and I did the BREATH journey earlier this year, and we are now this far into HOME. I wanted to share how amazed I am to find that I can do this; I can practise and grow stronger and more centred. It is profoundly empowering and deeply meaningful.

The first time I ever heard you say 'put one hand on your belly and one hand on your sweet heart,' I reached over without thinking and put my hand on my partner's heart. Tonight as we laid on our mats we held hands and softened together in gratitude. This really does feel like coming home to myself. So for all your work, I sincerely thank you. Namaste.
